articles.title: Kim Jong Un Issues Order to Raise Military Ranks of KPA Commanding Officers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Issues Order to Raise Military Ranks of KPA Commanding Officers
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un Friday issued an order to raise military ranks of commanding officers of the KPA in the run-up to the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 According to the order, Kim Sang Gap, Ju Tong Chol, Sim Jong Thaek, Ri Yong Min and Ri Song Hak were promoted to army lieut. generals, Ho Yong Ho to lieut. general of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, Ri Su Gyong, Kim Kwang Il and Jang Chun Won to rear admirals, An Pyong Chil and Choe Chol Su to major generals of Air Force, Nam Kil Hak and Kim Il Ung to major generals of Strategic Force, Kim Myong Ho, Kim Kwang Chol, Pae Chang Nam, Kim Yong Gun, Choe Kwang Chol, Ri Pong Man, Paek Song Chol, Jong Song Bom, Ri Jong Chol, Ri Nam Son, Kim Il Nam, Pae Hun, Ri Ju Yong, Ri Ik Gun, Kim Yong Ho, Kim Jong Chol, Choe Jae Sik, Kwak Jang Guk and Hong Song Ryong to army major generals and Ri Myong Jik, Kim Song Nam and Kim Kyong Hyop to major generals of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces. 
					
					 In the order Kim Jong Un expressed belief that the commanding officers of the KPA would fulfill their responsibilities and duties in the honorable struggle to bring earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche as early as possible, always bearing in mind the behests of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Croatia
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Croatia 
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Miro Kovac upon his appointment as foreign minister of Croatia. 
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would develop on good terms thanks to common efforts and wished the foreign minister of Croatia success in his new job.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Thursday received a reply message from Bashar Al-Assad, president of Syria.
					 The message said:
					
					 I express deep thanks to you for expressing sincere condolences and sympathy with the death of my mother, widow of Hafez Al-Assad who provided the foundation of strong relations between the two countries together with President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The comradeship expressed by you shows the special ties that exist between our two countries, the relations of mutual respect between us and the strong relations of solidarity between the peoples of the two countries struggling for the sovereignty and independence against the imperialists' domination. 
					
					 The message expressed profound thanks and extended sincere salute to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It sincerely wished Kim Jong Un and his family good health and happiness and the people of the DPRK greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Foreign Figure Skaters Here
articles.content:
Foreign Figure Skaters Here
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Figure skaters from Russia, Latvia, Belarus and Canada arrived here Saturday to take part in the 24th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival for Celebrating the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Delegation of Korean Friendship Association Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Korean Friendship Association Here
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Korean Friendship Association led by Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the association headquartered in Spain, arrived here Saturday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Contributors to Satellite Launch Tour in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Contributors to Satellite Launch Tour in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Contributors to the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 visited the Sci-Tech Complex Saturday.
					 Officials and employees of the complex warmly greeted them with garlands and bouquets.
					
					 They laid bunches of flowers before the picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the main lobby and made bows to them.
					
					 They looked round various places of the complex, being briefed on the fact that the complex was successfully built into a seat of learning as befitting the appearance of a highly civilized socialist nation and an edifice of national treasure, a combination of unique architectural beauty and perfect formative art.
					
					 They also went to the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.
					
					 They looked round with deep emotion the palace which was wonderfully built as a splendid edifice in the era of the Workers' Party.
					
					 On the same day they enjoyed a performance at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.

articles.title: Order of Kim Jong Il Conferred upon Persons of Distinguished Services
articles.content:
Order of Kim Jong Il Conferred upon Persons of Distinguished Services
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Order of Kim Jong Il was conferred upon Hong Chang Ui and Jang Jae Yong on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They made great contributions to accomplishing the cause of immortalizing the leaders and building a thriving socialist nation by arousing the party members and other people to the drive for implementing the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea and upholding the party's policies.
					
					 The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly promulgated a relevant decree Thursday.

articles.title: Scientific Achievements Made by Kim Il Sung University
articles.content:
Scientific Achievements Made by Kim Il Sung University
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK have made scientific achievements conducive to the country's economic development.
					 The Dynamics Faculty of the university remodeled the structure of pneumatic ultrafine disintegrator to reduce its power consumption by 50 percent.
					
					 The Material Science Faculty manufactured a new type of energy-saving fur-prevention device and made a contribution to localizing the silicon photoreception element.
					
					 Meanwhile, Pyongyang Medical College under the university developed a support program for education in human anatomy as well as medicines for the treatment of carbon monoxide poisoning and capsule materials.

articles.title: National Pencil Drawing Festival in DPRK
articles.content:
National Pencil Drawing Festival in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The 6th National Pencil Drawing Festival is going on at the Pyongyang International House of Culture to mark the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Feb. 16).
					 Presented to the festival are 360-odd works drawn by fine artists and working adults, school youth and children.
					
					 Ri Kyong Rim, an official of the Ministry of Culture, told KCNA:
					
					 Actuality and popularity are characteristics of those works.
					
					 The draftspersons creatively applied in their drawings various kinds of techniques to raise the formative artistic quality.
					
					 The works deal with a wide range of social life such themes as artistic representation of the leader, the greatness of the Workers' Party of Korea, revolutionary traditions, class education, building of socialism and army-people unity.
					
					 Nowadays, the pencil drawing is getting popular among people of all walks of life in the country for the simplicity of material and the quickness of creation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Iron-willed Commander
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Iron-willed Commander
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Now the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is fully displaying its dignity and might as a military giant possessed of H-bomb.
					 The credit for this goes to the undying feats of leader Kim Jong Il, who with Songun (army-first) politics had defended the country and nation, socialism and the global peace from the hostile forces' nuclear threat and blackmail.
					
					 The history recorded two rounds of nuclear showdown between the DPRK and the U.S. in early 1990s and early 2000s. In fact, they were acute politico-military confrontations between the DPRK and the U.S.-led multi-national forces.
					
					 At that time, the U.S. exerted unprecedented political isolation, economic blockade and military pressure on the DPRK for the latter's disobedience to the former's policy of aggression and attempted to bring a nuclear disaster to the Korean Peninsula. The U.S. and its followers concentrated the spearhead of attack on the DPRK holding fast to socialism, with collapse of socialism in some countries as a momentum.
					
					 The U.S. and some dishonest forces of the IAEA compelled the DPRK to accept an ad-hoc inspection, pulling it up over its peaceful nuclear program. In another development, the U.S. declared the resumption of the temporarily-suspended Team Spirit joint military exercises, kicking off the movement of its huge armed forces toward the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity.
					
					 Under such grave situation, Kim Jong Il issued an order of the Supreme Commander on declaring a state of semi-war to the whole country, all the people and the entire army on March 8, Juche 82 (1993). Then, a statement of the DPRK government was announced on March 12 on its withdrawal from NPT.
					
					 After all, the U.S. could not but sign the DPRK-U.S. Agreed Framework, the keynote of which is to offer light water reactors to the DPRK, and send the president's letter of assurance to the DPRK.
					
					 In early 2000s, the U.S. again sought to suffocate the DPRK over its peaceful nuclear facilities, announcing the OPLAN 5027, a scenario of nuclear preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 To cope with such challenge, the DPRK made clear its determination to possess nuclear deterrent and conducted a nuclear test successfully.
					
					 In the long run, the DPRK emerged a politico-military giant and a full-fledged nuclear-weapons state, reducing the arrogant U.S. to submission.
					
					 Today the great historic feats Kim Jong Il performed to display the tremendous power of the DPRK are shining more brilliantly under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Pyongyang Mission Chief of AINDF
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Pyongyang Mission Chief of AINDF
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Jo Il Min, chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF), was interviewed by KCNA on Saturday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il, who was born as the shining star over Mt. Paektu amid the blessings of the times and Koreans and performed the great exploits unprecedented in history, was the sacred one characterized by his love for the country, nation and people, Jo said, adding:
					
					 Taking to his heart more than anyone else the misfortune and pain suffered by Koreans due to national division, he devoted his all to building a prosperous reunified country.
					
					 Human history knows many great men and every country has its own leader but there is no such a peerless patriot as Kim Jong Il who dedicated himself to the country and nation.
					
					 Unshakable are the faith and will of the vanguard fighters and patriotic people in south Korea to devote themselves to the reunification of the country with ardent yearning for him.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is now leading the cause of reunification out of patriotism with his firm will to implement the behests of the peerlessly great men for national reunification.
					
					 We will strive hard to make 2016 a year of ushering in a new era of independent reunification, holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the lodestar of national reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Trying to Deny Status of DPRK's Nuclear Weapons State
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Trying to Deny Status of DPRK's Nuclear Weapons State
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) - The U.S. is busy with a malignant smear campaign intended to deny the DPRK's joining the advanced ranks of nuclear weapons states. Whenever an opportunity presents itself, the U.S. claims that the DPRK had access to nuclear weapons illegally and that is disturbing peace in the Korean Peninsula and the region.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms this a deliberate act to misrepresent the situation in disregard of the reality.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Every happening has reason and consequences. The DPRK had access to nuclear weapons entirely because of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. designated the DPRK as its enemy from the moment it was born and ignited a war against it and has posed a nuclear threat to it.
					
					 Neither international organization nor international treaty has helped ward off the U.S. undisguised nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					
					 Access to nuclear weapons was the only option to cope with it.
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to defend the sovereignty of the country and the security of the nation from the U.S. ever-escalating nuclear threat. In the long run, the U.S. pushed the DPRK to having access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 No one is allowed to take issue with the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons as it is legitimate and justifiable.
					
					 If peace is to be ensured in the Korean Peninsula, the U.S. should roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and opt for concluding a peace treaty with it, to begin with.
					
					 The DPRK, therefore, has long proposed the U.S. to replace the fragile Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty.
					
					 Whether a peaceful climate is created in the peninsula or not entirely depends how the U.S. responds to the DPRK's proposal, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flays S. Korean Warmongers' Threat to Peace
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flays S. Korean Warmongers' Threat to Peace
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Defense Ministry on Feb. 7 announced it would start official negotiations on the issue of deploying THAAD in south Korea, once again citing the DPRK's "serious threat". Meanwhile, the south Korean warmongers are revealing their scenario to apply "4D operation plan" which made it a fait accompli to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK to the Key Resolve joint military exercises they plan to stage together with U.S. forces.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary ridicules this as hysteric fit of warmongers bereft of reason.
					
					 Their provocative remarks bring to light who is escalating the tension in the Korean Peninsula and pushing the situation in its vicinity to the brink of war, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The projected north-targeted nuclear war maneuvers of the south Korean warmongers will never escape the curse and condemnation by public at home and abroad and history's stern judgment as they are a blatant challenge to the Korean nation and world progressives that love peace.
					
					 It is needless to say that the DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the reckless moves of the provocateurs bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the nation.
					
					 No one is allowed to blame the DPRK for steadily bolstering up capability for self-defence to cope with the reckless military provocations of the warmongers at home and abroad.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers would be well advised to stop acting rashly, clearly mindful that if they go reckless with the backing of foreign forces, they will meet the fate of a tiger moth, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Approach Korean Issue with Proper Insight
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Urges U.S. to Approach Korean Issue with Proper Insight
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- U.S. media recently assert that the DPRK has steadily bolstered up its nuclear capabilities despite the U.S. administrations' decades of sanctions against it and, therefore, the American government should conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK and normalize relations with it out of the will to settle the issue.
					 American website Reddit said in an article that the U.S. has slapped sanctions against North Korea for several decades but the latter has steadily bolstered its nuclear capabilities and turmoil expected by the U.S. has not occurred there. Libya soon surrendered as it had not been used to sanctions but North Korea has been exposed to decades of sanctions and, therefore, sanctions would not work on it, it added. 
					
					 It also held that the U.S. government should understand that the way of stopping North Korea from expanding its capabilities for nuclear development is to conclude a peace treaty with it and normalize relations with it, urging the U.S. to face up to the reality and create conditions for North Korea to respond to the demands of the international community.
					
					 The January issue of the U.S. Bulletin of Atomic Scientists in its story underscored the need for the world to engage North Korea in order to defuse the nuclear danger, not just reeling off a spate of rhetoric. Now is the time to have a sincere dialogue with North Korea, not to further isolation, the story noted.
					
					 The media were unanimous in their assertion that the U.S. administration has to behave to swim with the trend of the times, not clinging to the old anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Decades of the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK only heightened the anti-Americanism among the service personnel and people of the DPRK and only pushed the DPRK-U.S. relations to the point of explosion.
					
					 Sanctions and pressure will never work on the DPRK which has been exposed to all kinds of sanctions and blockade for decades.
					
					 Despite the enemies' ever-increasing threats and sanctions the foundation of the Juche-oriented self-supporting economy of the DPRK has been further consolidated and its nuclear deterrence for defending the sovereignty has also been bolstered on a daily basis.
					
					 The U.S. external policy for aggression has rendered the situation constantly tense in the Korean Peninsula which is situated in the center of Northeast Asia, a very sensitive area beset with lots of socio-historical and political and military problems.
					
					 The fundamental and best way of defusing such tension and preventing such a serious situation is to put a definite end to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and to establish durable and lasting peace-keeping mechanism in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. administration would be well advised to roll back its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK and face up to the trend of the times and the development of situation and behave with a proper outlook.

articles.title: Japan's Unreasonable Sanctions Measures against DPRK Blasted
articles.content:
Japan's Unreasonable Sanctions Measures against DPRK Blasted
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) held a news conference at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 12 in denunciation of the Japanese authorities' provocative sanctions racket against the DPRK.
					 Present at the conference were journalists of Chongryon and Japan and foreign correspondents in Japan.
					
					 Read out there was a statement of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee.
					
					 The statement disclosed that the Japanese government made public its decision to take independent sanctions measures against the DPRK on Feb. 10.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The recent move was conducted in an attempt to isolate and pressure the DPRK by stepping up the building of the triangle military alliance among the U.S., south Korea and Japan while vociferating about the "threat from the north" with its successful H-bomb test and successful launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 as a pretext. It is, therefore, an unpardonable action to create new artificial obstacles in the DPRK-Japan relations, unreasonably restrict and crack down Chongryon's activities and the life of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Japan's acts will have serious impact on the DPRK-Japan relations as they are a reckless provocation against the peoples of the two countries and the international public wishing for peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and the good neighborly friendship between the two countries.
					
					 The statement demanded the immediate withdrawal of the unwarranted sanctions against the DPRK.
					
					 Then, Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, answered the questions raised by journalists.
					
					 He laid bare the real intention sought by Japan in asserting that the military spy satellites launched by it are satellites in the true sense of the word but the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 is an IBM.
					
					 Saying that the Japanese government unilaterally scrapped the DPRK-Japan inter-governmental Stockholm agreement by slapping sanctions against the DPRK, he stressed that organizations of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon and headquarters in different areas would intensify information campaign denouncing the Japanese government's hostile acts and vicious sanctions racket against the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Group Slammed for Their Treacherous Acts
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Group Slammed for Their Treacherous Acts
 Tokyo, February 12 (KNS-KCNA) -- Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, issued a statement on Feb. 10 denouncing the south Korean puppet group's sycophancy and treachery.
					 It accused the authorities of not only concealing the past crimes committed by Japan against the Korean nation but going hectic to justify their treacherous acts.
					
					 The humiliating treacherous negotiations held by the group at the end of last year were nothing but the country-selling and sycophantic acts perpetrated by it, yielding to the U.S. pressure, it charged, and went on:.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group was aware of the fact that the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces introduced anthrax and pest germs into south Korea but concealed it for half a year, an intolerable crime.
					
					 The pro-U.S. group of traitors such as the Park group will never escape the curse and condemnation of all Koreans and history's stern judgment as it sold off the dignity and interests of the nation by kowtowing to the U.S. and is working hard to drop even nuclear and germ bombs over the fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Denounce Park Geun Hye Group for Its Pro-Japanese Acts
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Denounce Park Geun Hye Group for Its Pro-Japanese Acts
Tokyo, February 12 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) released statements on Thursday to denounce the south Korean puppet group for  its sycophantic acts.
					 Ri Yong Su, chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, said that voices of cursing and denouncing the Park Geun Hye group have increased day by day as it sold off the interests and dignity of the nation in the "agreement" with Japan on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 Pu Jong Saeng, chairwomen of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, stressed that Korean women in Osaka would vigorously come out in the struggle for forcing Japan to settle its past crimes and achieving national reunification in solidarity with Korean women in the north and the south and abroad.

articles.title: Kazak Kothongryon Chairman Hails DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Kazak Kothongryon Chairman Hails DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Kazakhstan made public a statement on Feb. 9 hailing the successful launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The statement said that successful satellite launch was a great event of the nation demonstrating to the world once again the powerful might of the DPRK.
					
					 The world will clearly see the satellites of Songun Korea soaring into the sky anytime and at any place set by the DPRK, it noted, adding:
					
					 No force on earth can block the road of the great Paektusan nation strictly abiding by the principle of giving priority to self-development or match the might of the DPRK.
					
					 Koreans in overseas will turn out as one in the dynamic struggle for Korea's reunification in the idea of By Our Nation Itself with great national pride and self-respect.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Works Posted by German Organizations on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Works Posted by German Organizations on Its Website
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The full texts of leader Kim Jong Il's works "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" and "On Having a Correct Understanding of Nationalism" were posted by the Anti－Imperialist Forum of Germany on its website on February 7.
					 The work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution", published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun-based revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode in the present era that has carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line on attaching importance to the army, and a scientific and revolutionary line and political mode most correctly meeting the requirements of the times and the revolution.
					
					 The work "On Having a Correct Understanding of Nationalism", published in February, Juche 91 (2002), deals with the birth and essence of nationalism and the past view on it and important issues arising in achieving independent development of the nation.
					
					 The website carried a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Seminars on leader Kim Jong Il's exploits were held by the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army and the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi on February 5 and 6 on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star (his birth anniversary).
					 The first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation praised Kim Jong Il as the peerless patriot and a model of genuine internationalists who devoted himself to the prosperity of Korea, traditional friendly relations between Russia and the DPRK and accomplishment of the cause of human independence.
					
					 The secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation lauded Kim Jong Il as the outstanding politician who wisely led the party and people of the DPRK to the road of socialism and Songun by setting forth a correct ideology and line.
					
					 The chairman of the Tradition Association of the Polish People's Army said the Korean people are meeting all challenges of the hostile forces and firmly defending the sovereignty of the country as Kim Jong Il performed great feats for the country and its people.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi and other speakers said Kim Jong Il shattered the moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK and firmly defended the destiny of the country and the nation with his original Songun politics, adding the feats he performed in accomplishing the socialist cause would always be remembered by mankind.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Germany 
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Germany on February 7. 
					 The representative of the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and hold colorful political and cultural events.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Russia
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed at the Maritime Territorial branch of the All-Russia Women's Council "Hope of Russia" on February 9. 
					 Chairwoman of the branch T. N. Esikova was elected chairwoman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il who made great contributions to implementing the cause of human independence.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Nigerian Figures
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Nigerian Figures
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Nigerian figures warmly hailed the DPRK's successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria and chairman of the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association, issued a statement on Feb. 7.
					
					 He warmly congratulated the dignified DPRK upon succeeding in putting earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 into its orbit and positively supported the launch as it is a proud exercise of the sovereign state's right to use space for peaceful purpose, the statement said.
					
					 Developing space can not be the monopolies of specified countries but is a legitimate right of all member states of the UN, it noted.
					
					 It hoped the DPRK, satellite manufacturing and launching state, would achieve bigger successes in launching more satellites in the future, too.
					
					 Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, said in his statement on the same day that the DPRK's successful satellite launch is a proud exercise of the independent right to use space for peaceful purposes and marks a significant event in developing science, technology, economy and defense capability.
					
					 He wished the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people brilliant victory in their struggle for smashing the hostile forces' moves to stifle the country, building a thriving nation and reunifying the country.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful Satellite Launch Hailed by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Foreign figures hailed the DPRK's successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 on Feb. 7 and 9.
					 Vinogradov who was the correspondent of the maritime territorial branch of TASS said in a statement that the recent satellite launch proved the DPRK's access to space technology and it gave all of them delight, adding an astronaut of the DPRK would fly into space before long.
					
					 Gonzalez Trujillo, president of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia, sent a congratulatory message to the DPRK mission. The message extended heartfelt congratulations to the Korean people on the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4, saying that the recent successful satellite launch is a remarkable event not only for the DPRK but also in the field of space science and technology.
					
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", made a phone call to the DPRK mission in which he said the successful satellite launch is the proud exercise of the independent right to use space for peaceful purposes and a brilliant victory of the DPRK's line on attaching importance to science and technology.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in booklet by the Cedi Publishing House of DR Congo.
					 The work published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the essence of leader Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his sacred career characterized by loving care for the country and people.
					
					 It also indicates the important matters arising in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony was held by the Working Citizens' Association of DR Congo on Feb. 6.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by DR Congo Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by DR Congo Figure
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il is a peerless patriot who loved the country and people more warmly than others and devoted his life to the country's prosperity and people's happiness. He made a long journey of Songun to safeguard socialist Korea and wisely led the building of a thriving socialist nation even under the harsh situation.
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo, said this at a releasing ceremony of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work held on Feb. 6.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un is now smashing the hostile forces' moves to stifle the DPRK and wisely and energetically leading the struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country.
					
					 The DPRK's recent world-startling events, its successful first H-bomb test and the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea which is to be held soon will clearly show how the plan of leader Kim Jong Il for building a prosperous country comes true.
					
					 We highly praise the immortal exploits of the peerlessly great men and will positively support the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Korean Friendship Association Hails Successful Launch of Satellite Kwangmyongsong-4
articles.content:
Korean Friendship Association Hails Successful Launch of Satellite Kwangmyongsong-4
 Pyongyang, February 13 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain made public a statement on February 7 hailing the successful launch of the earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4. 
					 Noting that the successful launch was just like the fireworks displayed by the DPRK on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star), the statement went on:
					
					 The satellite launch fully demonstrated the strong power, scientific and technical potentiality and the might of self-supporting economy of the DPRK under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Steadfast is the determination of the DPRK to build without fail a thriving nation envied by the world under any pressure. 
					
					 Satellites of the DPRK will ceaselessly be launched into space no matter what rhetoric the U.S. imperialists and their followers may spout. 
					
					 The world progressives look up to satellites of the DPRK with admiration, convinced that the Korean people will achieve the final victory by shattering the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un ordena ascender grados militares de comandantes de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un ordena ascender grados militares de comandantes de EPC
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dio el  dia 12 una orden de ascender los grados militares de los comandantes del EPC, con motivo del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Segun la orden, el grado de teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres fue otorgado a Kim Sang Gap, Ju Tong Chol, Sim Jong Thaek, Ri Yong Min y Ri Song Hak; el de teniente general del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior a Ho Yong Ho; el de contralmirante a Ri Su Gyong, Kim Kwang Il y Jang Chun Won; el de mayor general de las fuerzas aereas a An Pyong Chil y Choe Chol Su; el de mayor general de las fuerzas estrategicas a Nam Kil Hak y Kim Il Ung; el de mayor general de las fuerzas terrestres a Kim Myong Ho, Kim Kwang Chol, Pae Chang Nam, Kim Yong Gun, Choe Kwang Chol, Ri Pong Man, Paek Song Chol, Jong Song Bom, Ri Jong Chol, Ri Nam Son, Kim Il Nam, Pae Hun, Ri Ju Yong, Ri Ik Gun, Kim Yong Ho, Kim Jong Chol, Choe Jae Sik, Kwak Jang Guk y Hong Song Ryong y el de mayor general del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior a Ri Myong Jik, Kim Song Nam y Kim Kyong Hyop.
					
					El Comandante Supremo expreso su confianza de que los comandantes del EPC cumpliran con su responsabilidad y  deber en la honrosa lucha por adelantar la victoria final de la causa de la revolucion del Juche guardando siempre en el corazon los legados de los grandes Lideres.

articles.title: Delegacion de PTC se reune con presidente de Laos
articles.content:
Delegacion de PTC se reune con presidente de Laos
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- La delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea encabezada por Kim Yong Chol, secretario del Comite Central del PTC de visita en Laos, se  reunio el dia 12 en la sede presidencial con Choummaly Sayasone, presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao.
					En la ocasion, Choummaly Sayasone senalo que deviene un gran estimulo para el partido, el gobierno y el pueblo de Laos el hecho de que el Mariscal Kim Jong Un haya enviado la delegacion del PTC para felicitar la exitosa conclusion del Decimo Congreso del PPRL.
					
					Afirmo que seran invariables para siempre las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion preparadas por los lideres antecedentes de ambos paises y agrego que Laos siempre apoyara la justa causa del pueblo coreano.
					
					Manifesto la conviccion de que se realizara sin falta la causa de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien continua con firmeza la causa del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia imprudencia anti-paz de belicistas surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia imprudencia anti-paz de belicistas surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 7, el Ministerio de Defensa del Sur de Corea anuncio que comenzara la consulta oficial sobre el emplazamiento de THAAD de Estados Unidos, volviendo a acusar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de "grave amenaza". 
					En tanto, los belicistas surcoreanos expresan su intento de aplicar en el simulacro conjunto Sur de Corea-EE.UU. Key Resolve el "OPLAN 4D", cuya meta es asestar el ataque preventivo nuclear a la RPDC. 
					
					En un comentario individual de este sabado, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de histerismo de los maniacos de guerra y continua:
					
					El proceder provocativo de los belicistas surcoreanos demuestra quien es el autor que agrava mas la tension de la Peninsula Coreana y lleva la situacion de la region al borde de la guerra. 
					
					El alboroto de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC de los belicistas surcoreanos en confabulacion con EE.UU., siendo un desafio brutal a la nacion coreana y la humanidad progresista aspirantes a la paz, causara el rechazo y repudio de todo el mundo y no podra eludir el castigo severo de la historia. 
					
					Es ilogico que observemos con brazos cruzados el proceder de los provocadores que acarrean el nubarron de guerra nuclear a la nacion coreana. 
					
					Nadie puede censurar el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de autodefensa de la RPDC frente a la imprudencia militar de los belicistas internos y externos. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben actuar con prudencia teniendo presente que les traera el fin tragico su indiscrecion bajo el amparo de las fuerzas extranjeras.

articles.title: Hay que portarse con vision correcta, comenta ACNC
articles.content:
Hay que portarse con vision correcta, comenta ACNC
Pyongyang, 13 de febrero (ACNC) -- En estos dias, los medios de prensa de Estados Unidos insisten en que aun en medio de la sancion de decenios de la administracion norteamericana contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, esta ha fortalecido constantemente su capacidad nuclear, razon por la cual el gobierno estadounidense debe concertar el convenio de la paz y realizar la normalizacion de las relaciones con ella con la voluntad de resolver el problema.
					 El sitio web de EE.UU., Reddit, senala en su articulo que aunque EE.UU. vino ejerciendo la sancion durante varios decenios, el Norte de Corea intensifico incesantemente su capacidad nuclear y en este pais no ocurrio cualquier disturbio deseado tanto por EE.UU.
					
					 Prosigue que Libia, no acostumbrada a la sancion, capitulo enseguida, pero tal metodo no surte efecto en el Norte de Corea porque este ha vivido bajo la sancion durante decenios.
					
					 Destaca que el gobierno estadounidense tambien debe conocer que el remedio para prevenir la ampliacion de la capacidad del desarrollo nuclear del Norte de Corea reside en concertar el convenio de paz con este, realizar la normalizacion de las relaciones, etc., reconocer la realidad y crear la condicion para que el Norte de Corea acepte la demanda de la sociedad internacional.
					
					 Ademas el numero de enero de Boletin de Cientificos de Energia Atomica de EE.UU., en su articulo, demanda que el mundo debe tener relacion con el Norte de Corea para disminuir el peligro nuclear.  Continua que ahora es necesario no fortalecer el aislamiento contra el Norte de Corea sino realizar el dialogo sincero con este.
					
					  Asi los medios de prensa insisten unanimemente en que la administracion norteamericana no debe recurrir a la invariable politica hostil contra la RPDC sino portarse bien conforme a la corriente de la tendencia y la situacion en desarrollo.
					
					  Las maniobras de aplastamiento de EE.UU. contra la RPDC que EE.UU. durante decenios, aumentaron mas el sentimiento antiyanqui del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea y llevaron al limite de explosion las relaciones Corea-EE.UU.
					
					  La sancion y la presion no surten ningun efecto en la RPDC que ha vivido bajo la sancion de toda indole y el bloqueo de las fuerzas hostiles durante decenios.
					
					  Aun en medio de la creciente amenaza y sancion de los enemigos la base de la economia independiente del Juche de la RPDC se consolido firmemente y el disuasivo nuclear para defender la soberania tambien se amplia y se desarrolla cada dia mas.
					
					  En la Peninsula Coreana situada en el centro del Noreste de Asia, region muy aguda con muchos problemas socio-historicos y politico-militares, se agrava constantemente la situacion debido a la politica exterior de caracter agresivo de EE.UU.
					
					  El remedio principal y primordial para eliminar tal tension y prevenir la situacion mas grave, es acabar radicalmente con la politica hostil de EE.UU. y establecer el sistema del aseguramiento de la paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  La administracion norteamericana no debe recurrir a la invariable politica hostil contra la RPDC sino conocer bien la corriente de la tendencia y la situacion en desarrollo y portarse bien con la vision correcta.
